name: Diana's Way Home
description:
Diana's Way Home is kind of game that will make you feel better at comfort, because you will help Diana for get back to her home by overcoming the obstacles and collecting some fruits!

This game is the result of my personal project as informatics college student from Telkom University, Bandung, Indonesia.

Controls:

- Arrow Keys Left and Right for avoid obstacles (to go left and right)

-Space Bar for Jump
